definition: tathagata (Buddha's name for himself, having many layers of meaning - Sanskrit: thus gone, having been Brahman, gone to the absolute etc)
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
arriving early can't beat coming at the right time/perfect timing
pinyin: lai2 de5 zao3 bu4 ru2 lai2 de5 qiao3

sentences.english: The body of the Tathagata is adamantine and indestructible.
sentences.chinese: 如來的身體是金剛體，牢不可破。

sentences.english: Fu Lions in China are also known as the lions of the Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，福獅又叫如來神獅。

sentences.english: Was there any Dharma which the Tathàgata obtained while with Burning Lamp Buddha?
sentences.chinese: 如來昔在燃燈佛所，於法有所得不？

sentences.english: I have this right mindfulness, said Tathagata name, Lime Road, survive the Pure Land.
sentences.chinese: 我今正念，稱如來名，爲菩提道，求生淨土。

sentences.english: In this instance, the life-force refers to the Tathagatagarbha.
sentences.chinese: 在這種情況下，生命力是指如來藏。

sentences.english: Thus, no ageing occurs in the case of the Tathagata.
sentences.chinese: 因此，就如來而言沒有年齡的變化。

sentences.english: Why the Buddha? Because Buddhas, Tathagatas, have cosmic bodies, and so enter into the meditating mind of each sentient being.
sentences.chinese: 所以者何？諸佛如來，是法界身，入一切衆生心想中。

sentences.english: Today, my boyfriend talked me into having drunk sex.
sentences.chinese: 今天我男朋友說咱們不如來場醉後補魔吧。

sentences.english: Three months hence the Tathagata will utterly pass away.
sentences.chinese: 三個月後如來將要完全消逝。

sentences.english: When the Tathagata teaches that there is no self, it is because of the Eternal.
sentences.chinese: 當如來教導人們沒有自我，那是因爲永恆。

sentences.english: And will not be able to see the Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 是人行邪道，不能見如來。

sentences.english: Fifth, tathagatagarbha and its relationship with the five dharmas.
sentences.chinese: 第五，如來藏及其與五法之關係。

sentences.english: Tathagatas don't personally handle things, however. It is Bodhisattvas who do things to save people.
sentences.chinese: 如來也不親自管，菩薩在做度人的事。

sentences.english: One must say that the Tathagata is an Uncreate.
sentences.chinese: 他必須說如來是非創造的。

sentences.english: That is, saying that the Tathagata is an Uncreate .
sentences.chinese: 這就是，說如來是非創造的。

sentences.english: Hence we say that the Tathagata enters Great Nirvana.
sentences.chinese: 因此我們說如來進入了涅磐。
